nodes.text: The Blue Sector was a location in Coronet City on the planet Corellia. The ASP-9 "Vrelt" autopistol manufactured by Talus Ironworks saw use within the Blue Sector by inspectors of the Corellian Security Forces at crime scenes.

The Blue Sector was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Gadgets and Gear, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. It was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by BioWare Austin and released by LucasArts.
